code: import React,{useState}from"react";import'../assets/styles/Nav.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Navbar(_ref){let{setCurrentPage}=_ref;const[navMenuClass,setNavMenuClass]=useState("nav__menu");const[menuIconClass,setMenuIconClass]=useState("nav__toggler");const[isThemeActive,setIsThemeActive]=useState(false);const handleThemeToggle=()=>{setIsThemeActive(!isThemeActive);};const toggleMobileMenu=()=>{setNavMenuClass(navMenuClass==="nav__menu"?"nav__menu nav__active":"nav__menu");setMenuIconClass(menuIconClass==="nav__toggler"?"nav__toggler toggle":"nav__toggler");};const handleNavigation=page=>{setCurrentPage(page);setNavMenuClass("nav__menu");setMenuIconClass("nav__toggler");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"nav",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"logo",onClick:()=>handleNavigation('home'),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Home"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:navMenuClass,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav__item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"nav__link",onClick:()=>handleNavigation('about'),children:"About"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav__item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"nav__link",onClick:()=>handleNavigation('projects'),children:"Projects"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav__item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"nav__link",onClick:()=>handleNavigation('contact'),children:"Contact"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav__item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:`theme-switcher ${isThemeActive?'active':''}`,onClick:handleThemeToggle})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{onClick:toggleMobileMenu,className:menuIconClass,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"line1"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"line2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"line3"})]})]});}export default Navbar;
